text: @NYGovCuomo Sorry douche hole. Not a law. Not required. Not reasonable. If I buy a box of masks at Walmart it SAYS RIGHT ON THE BOX "WILL NOT PROTECT AGAINST COVID19". So why TF am I supposed to wear a mask? You're almost as stupid as your brother. Your father wasn't a Nazi. You? Yeah.
